channel.title: Best 3D Program to use for MMORPG Images?
channel.description: I am currently in the process of making Images for an MMORPG I am making. I want the image's to look sort of like the RuneScape ones. I have yet to find a good 3D Program that will allow me to make Image's like RuneScapes or MoparScapes. So, I was wondering if anybody here knows a 3D Image making Program that I could use to create the 3D Image's I need for an MMORPG somewhat like Runescape. All help appreciate, thanks.

item.title: Best 3D Program to use for MMORPG Images?
item.dc:creator: @Se7eN Se7eN
item.description:
@Se7eN wrote:

i use rhino3d which is in my opinion the easiest to use however because of it’s ease of use you sacrifice some of the cooler effects (reflections, limited material access, animation, etc.) but since your trying to make it runescape-ish the lack of detail probably shouldn’t affect you. as it will most likly be vector based 3d. the last great thing about rhino is that it works grat with just about any graphics program out there 3d or 2d regardless.

-Se7eN

Read full topic
item.source: Best 3D Program to use for MMORPG Images?

@jme wrote:

Slave Scyth:

Hmm… Any other’s?

Wings3d is free and quite possibly the easiest 3d modelling software I have ever used.

item.source: Best 3D Program to use for MMORPG Images?

item.title: Best 3D Program to use for MMORPG Images?
item.dc:creator: @MybBob MybBob
item.description:
@MybBob wrote:

Some of the more popular programs are of the following;

Autodesk 3D Max 8.0 and Above
Maxon C4D
Ulead Cool3d
Terragen

Autodesk; is a good reliable program that can create very life like images if you are willing to work on it.

MaxonC4D; yet again reliable this program is EXCELLENT for creating figures and such, as it comes in with the hair tool and such.

Ulead Cool3d; good for creating images and getting some movements down.

Terragen; Excellent for creating stable and secksi backgrounds.

Read full topic
item.source: Best 3D Program to use for MMORPG Images?

Look up some 3d modelling programs. Just remember, there is no such thing’s as a “make WoW” button.

those are all made with a program called 3dmax…

I use it a lot to make some renders from my sigs, banners, and wallpapers…

Its like a $1000 program but with a little research i’m sure you can dig up a cracked version…[/quote]Is it called 3ds Max? I am on the site for 3ds max and it says it is only about $200 - $400
